name: ORCA
short_description:
A newer version, including some more features and functions, is under development and will be released soon.


ORCA is a Matlab package extending the scope of established COBRA metabolic modelling and integrates three unique functionalities: 1) a framework method integrating three analyses of multi-objective optimization, robustness analysis and fractional benefit analysis, 2) metabolic pathways identification with  futile loop elimination and 3) a dynamic flux balance analysis framework (dFBA) incorporating kinetic constraints. 


Mao, L., & Verwoerd, W. S. (2014) ORCA: A COBRA toolbox extension for model-driven discovery and analysis. Bioinformatics, 30(4), 584-585.
summary: ORCA- a suite of functions that complement the existing COBRA methods
